data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Zibo, Shandong, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zibo, Shandong, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Zibo, Shandong, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Zibo, Shandong, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Zibo who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Zibo that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Zibo, Shandong, China.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Zibo you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Zibo, Shandong, China has a population of 4,062,500.

We estimate Zibo has 308,186 people who might know Jesus, 65,629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,688,685 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Zibo.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
